feature.evaluation

Class DiscreteAttributeValueSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.evaluation.DiscreteAttributeValueSplitter

  • public class DiscreteAttributeValueSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the split logic for discrete feature values.

        public void setEmptyToleration(boolean emptySplitBranchesTolerated)
        Parameters:

      • generateIndexedSplitFromGivenDiscretization

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[] generateIndexedSplitFromGivenDiscretization(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexedSubset,
                                                                                   int attType,
                                                                                   int attIndex)
        Generates a split as an array of lists from the existing bucketing in the discretized dataset.
        Parameters:
        indexedSubset - A list of integers representing a subset of the data.
        attType - Integer representing the feature type, as defined in DataMineConstants.
        attIndex - Index of the feature of the specified type in its feature group.
        Returns:
        Array of ArrayList objects of data indexes, representing the split.

      • generateIndexedSplitOnAttribute

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[] generateIndexedSplitOnAttribute(int attType,
                                                                       int attIndex)
        Generates a split as an array of lists from the existing bucketing in the discretized dataset.
        Parameters:
        attType - Integer representing the feature type, as defined in DataMineConstants.
        attIndex - Index of the feature of the specified type in its feature group.
        Returns:
        Array of ArrayList objects of data indexes, representing the split.

      • generateSplitOnAttribute

        public DiscretizedDataSet[] generateSplitOnAttribute(int attType,
                                            int attIndex)
        Generates a split as an array of discretized datasets.
        Parameters:
        attType - Integer representing the feature type, as defined in DataMineConstants.
        attIndex - Index of the feature of the specified type in its feature group.
        Returns:
        Array of ArrayList objects of data indexes, representing the split.
